RGGameFrame - Class in com.concordia.soen6441riskgame
This class creates a frame with two panels.
RGGameFrame(RGFile, RGGame, RGPlayer) - Constructor for class com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGGameFrame
This constructor set the frame and the panels.
RGGraph - Class in com.concordia.soen6441riskgame
Class that implements a collection of lists not only to represent a graph but also to handle the information of continents, the game, and the players.
RGGraph() - Constructor for class com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGGraph
 
RGMapEditorFrame - Class in com.concordia.soen6441riskgame
Class that creates the starting frame of the application.
RGMapEditorFrame() - Constructor for class com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGMapEditorFrame
This constructor set the frame and add all the objects a player needs to create, edit, validate, and save a Risk® map.
RGMapGraph - Class in com.concordia.soen6441riskgame
This class draws a complete map.
RGMapGraph(RGFile, RGGame, RGPlayer) - Constructor for class com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGMapGraph
This constructor set the objects of the current, game, graph and set of players.
RGPlayer - Class in com.concordia.soen6441riskgame
Class to store and control the information of a set of players --between 2 and 6 players per game.
RGPlayer() - Constructor for class com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGPlayer
This constructor creates a list of six colors to assign them later to every player where it is required.
RGPlayersFrame - Class in com.concordia.soen6441riskgame
This class creates a frame where the user is asked to enter the names of the players of the Risk® game.
RGPlayersFrame(RGFile, RGGame) - Constructor for class com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGPlayersFrame
This constructor set the frame and add all the objects the user needs to create a set of players.
